Posts.Content: Feb 16, 2010 12:22PM Lea32 wrote: Tisgirl, I am sorry that you have to go through this now when you should be celebrating your pregnancy.  If it was me, I wouldn't wait 3 wks for an u/s.  I would call around and see who could get me in sooner.  I am seeing my OB this afternoon for a lump in my left armpit I found last night.  I hope they take me seriously and order the u/s.  IF, I have to wait 3 wks I think I will go mad.  I can barely function and I just found out. Sending good thoughts your way.  Please post once you have your u/s.
Posts.Title: Nervous - Pregnant with a Lump tilsgirl Lea32
